price: 27. Kuwa gaalooba waxay yidhaahdaan: Maxaa calaamo (mucjiso) looga soo dejin waayey xagga Rabbigii? (Nabiyow) Dheh: Alle wuxuu dhumiyaa kuu doono oo u soo hanuuniyaa Xaggiisa kuwa u soo laabta (toobad keena).
arabic: وَيَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦۚ قُلۡ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُضِلُّ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهۡدِيٓ إِلَيۡهِ مَنۡ أَنَابَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlu alladhīna kafarū lawlā unzila ʿalayhi āyatun min rabbihi qul inna al-laha yuḍillu man yashāu wayahdī ilayhi man anāba
